step.cmd: Connect the grey water filtration overflow to the on-site wastewater line.
Mount the corresponding connecting lines for venting on top of the filtering tanks ( pcs), and the lines for levelling at the front of the tanks.

info.p: In addition, the assembly group with tank must be vented via an accompanying connection to assembly group i.e the first tank in this group to the last tank in group .

step.cmd: Connect the tube of the feed pump ( pcs).
The tubes of the filtration pump ( pcs) must be connected to the nozzles of assembly group , provided for that purpose (observe designation/colour coding).
